keyword: calories in a granny smith apple
title: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in a granny smith apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per medium fruit.
h1: Calories in a Granny Smith Apple
assumptions: Medium-sized (~182 g with skin and core removed for edible portion), raw, unpeeled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, growing conditions, and variety; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium Granny Smith apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium raw apple.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.4 g of dietary fiber per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are Granny Smith apples low in sugar?
faqs.a: They have ~18.9 g natural sugars per medium apple, lower glycemic than sweeter varieties.

faqs.q: Does peeling a Granny Smith apple reduce calories?
faqs.a: Slightlyâ€”peeling removes ~5 kcal and some fiber.

faqs.q: How does Granny Smith compare to other apples nutritionally?
faqs.a: Similar to red apples: ~95 kcal medium, but tarter with comparable carbs and fiber.
